title: Gorgonzola and wild mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['100g dried chanterelle mushrooms', '1 1/2 teaspoons butter', '1 teaspoon truffle oil (optional)', '1 chopped onion', '2 shallots, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '100g sliced fresh button mushrooms', '330g Arborio rice', '125ml dry white wine', '1 litre hot chicken stock', '2 tablespoons double cream', '2 tablespoons crumbled Gorgonzola cheese, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
